metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)
Create a PDF and send it for review
Create PDFs by printing to file

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Acrobat and Acrobat Reader users can use the Fill Sign tool to fill in flat forms . The tools are enabled for the current form only . When you create a different form, redo this task to enable Acrobat reader users to use the tools . See Create a form from an existing document. See Create an interactive form to create an interactive

An interactive form contains fields that you can select or fill in . If necessary, select either the Hand Tool or the Select Tool from the context menu of the page . The Hand tool changes to an I-beam when you can type text into the form field . When finished, submit the form to either send the data to a server or create an email

Create a PDF and send it for review. Follow the directions in the wizard that appears in Start an email-based review . Click the Convert To Adobe PDF And Send For Review button on the Acrobat PDFMaker toolbar . Use the Adobe PDF Convert to Adobe PDF and Send for Review button to create a PDF . If you want to send a

The current Distiller preference settings and Adobe PDF settings are used to convert the file . If youre working with nonstandard page sizes, create a custom page size . For Microsoft Office documents, the Adobe PDF printer does not include some of the features that are available from PDFMaker. For example, you cannot create bookmarks and hyperlinks using

Manage your bulk sends Bulk sends can be managed from your Documents tab . Single-click the Bulk Send you to want to access, opening the context menu on the right side of the window . The current status of the whole Bulk Send The Message provided in the initial email Any CCd parties (listed by email value) Actions menu (blue square)

Acrobat creates a blank page PDF, rather than beginning with a file, a clipboard image, or scanning . For longer, more complex, or heavily formatted documents, it's better to create the source document in an application that offers more layout and formatting options . Do any of the following In Acrobat, select Create from the global bar.
